type.name: org.gradle.language.twirl.TwirlSourceSet
type.description: Represents a source set containing twirl templates

method.name: getDefaultImports
method.description: The default imports that should be added to generated source files

method.name: setDefaultImports
method.description: Sets the default imports that should be added to generated source files to the given language

property.name: defaultImports
property.description: The default imports that should be added to generated source files
